source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a massive storm system. The video appears to be a time-lapse, capturing the dramatic movement of the dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. The storm moves over a flat, green landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a massive storm system. The video appears to be a time-lapse, capturing the dramatic movement of the dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. The storm moves over a flat, green landscape.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the subject as a storm system but uses the speculative phrase "appears to be" and the subjective adjective "dramatic," which should be avoided. The description of the cloud motion as "churn and roll" is too generic and misses the specific, structured movements visible in the time-lapse. For instance, the caption fails to mention the distinct rotational motion of the central storm tower, indicating a supercell, and it overlooks the contrasting movements of different cloud layers, where low-level clouds are pulled inward toward the storm's base while the upper anvil cloud spreads outward. Furthermore, the description omits other key visual events, such as the intermittent flashes of lightning within the dark cloud mass and the progression of the storm's shadow as it moves across the green landscape, darkening the ground as the system advances from one side of the frame to the other.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a time-lapse of a massive storm system, showcasing the structured movements of the clouds. The central storm tower exhibits a distinct rotational motion, characteristic of a supercell, while low-level clouds are drawn inward toward the storm's base and the upper anvil cloud spreads outward. Intermittent flashes of lightning illuminate the dark cloud mass, and the storm's shadow progresses across the flat, green landscape, darkening the ground as the system advances from one side of the frame to the other.
